name: Arcade
description: Old screen + old pc + old games = arcade cabinet!

name: Weather Station
description: With more then a million rows of data and a 24/7 monitoring of my appartement this weather station is holding up ! a combination of an esp32, node red and graphana i can monitor the temperature of my appartement, inside and outside.

name: HTC Vive custom audio strap
description: Sometimes the easier projects are the ones that are the most usefull. Using an old pair od headphones i was able to create my own integration audio solution for my VR headset. Maybe the quality is not as good but at least it didn't cost me 150â‚¬

name: CheapDeck
description: Realy simple electronics and 3D printin project, but also very usefull !

name: Robot Mower
description: Why buy a mower when you can make one (easier said then done) ? Project in collaboration with my dad !

name: WikiGame
description: Get from a random wikipedia page to another random one, only by clicking links on the pages. A simple but hard game !

name: Furmap.net
description: With more then 12 000 users, furmap is now well known in the furry community. The first version was coded in only one day and has now been active for more then 2 years. This is, to date my most successful project and the one i am most proud of

name: Connected picture frame
description: Just a little raspberry to get some information at a glance.

name: Scientific Game Jam 2020
description: A lonely robots needs to break rocks on a mysterious planet to analyse them!

name: Scientific Game Jam 2019
description: In this game jam we made a game to sensibilize about the risks of IOT devices for patients of chronical deseeses
